METADATA_TERM_DESCRIPTION_IDENTIFIER.message: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

METADATA_TERM_DESCRIPTION_TITLE.message: A name given to the resource.

METADATA_TERM_DESCRIPTION_CREATOR.message: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.

METADATA_TERM_DESCRIPTION_CONTRIBUTOR.message: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.

METADATA_TERM_DESCRIPTION_PUBLISHER.message: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

METADATA_TERM_DESCRIPTION_DATE_COPYRIGHT.message: Date of copyright of the resource.

METADATA_TERM_DESCRIPTION_SOURCE.message: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

METADATA_INSTRUCTIONS.message:
There are two types of metadata - single valued and multivalued.

Single valued metadata - simply type/edit/delete the value in the input field.

Multivalued metadata (Creator, Contributor):

  • to add a new value - type value to the input field and press Enter; the value will be saved and visible under the input;
  • to delete a saved value - click the value and click trash icon;
  • to update a saved value - click the value, edit it in the input field and press Enter;
